FuncDef: This command specifies a match criteria that uses the peer s identification initiator (IDi) as the input, only one IDi criteria can be configured for a given client entry. This command supports the following matching methods:

ParaDef.Info: Matches any type of IDi with any value.
Matches any IPv4 address and prefix.
Matches any IPv6 address and prefix.
Matches the type of IDi value for this IPsec client entry. Values-fqdn, fqdn-suffix, rfc822, rfc822-suffix.
Matches the IDi value within the client ID for this IPsec client entry up to 256 characters.
